query.statement:
SELECT A1.AREA CS136_ARA, CASE WHEN A1.LGORT = '0000' THEN '총합계' WHEN A1.LGORT = 'YYYY' THEN '소계' WHEN A1.LGORT = 'XXXX' THEN '소계' ELSE A1.AREA_NM END AREA_NM, A1.LGORT CS136_BSU, A1.LIFNR_NM, CASE WHEN RTRIM(A1.LIFNR) > '' THEN SUBSTR(A1.LIFNR,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A1.LIFNR,4,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A1.LIFNR,6,5) ELSE '' END LIFNR, A1.CNAME, A1.CS136_HNO, CASE WHEN A1.CS136_HNO = 'G' THEN '' ELSE A1.HNO_NM END HNO_NM, CASE WHEN A1.CS136_GND = 'I' OR A1.CS136_GND = 'J' OR A1.CS136_GND = 'K' THEN '' ELSE A1.GND_NM END GND_NM, A1.CS136_GND, A1.AFLG, A1.BFLG, VALUE(B1.CS131_CNT,0) CS131_CNT, VALUE(B1.CS131_AMT,0) CS131_AMT, VALUE(B1.GISUNG_AMT,0) GISUNG_AMT, VALUE(B1.GONG_AMT,0) GONG_AMT, CASE WHEN A1.LGORT IN ('XXXX','YYYY') AND A1.CS136_GND = 'H' THEN VALUE(C1.BUGA_AMT,0) WHEN A1.LGORT = '0000' AND A1.CS136_GND = 'H' THEN VALUE(D1.BUGA_AMT,0) ELSE VALUE(B1.BUGA_AMT,0) END BUGA_AMT, CASE WHEN A1.LGORT IN ('XXXX','YYYY') AND A1.CS136_GND = 'H' THEN VALUE(C1.SUM_AMT,0) WHEN A1.LGORT = '0000' AND A1.CS136_GND = 'H' THEN VALUE(D1.SUM_AMT,0) ELSE VALUE(B1.SUM_AMT,0) END SUM_AMT FROM ( -- 지역,협력사,제품구분,보수구분(틀) SELECT DISTINCT '00' ARA_GBN, '00' AREA, '' AREA_NM, '' LIFNR, '' LIFNR_NM, '' CNAME, '0000' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '5' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '6' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '무상' WHEN 'C' THEN '공사용' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상' WHEN 'F' THEN '부판인' ELSE MM028B.CTEXT2 END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '4' END ORD, '5' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 <> 'E'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '5' ORD, '6' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT 'YY' ARA_GBN, 'YY' AREA, '' AREA_NM, '' LIFNR, '' LIFNR_NM, '' CNAME, 'YYYY' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '4' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '5' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '무상' WHEN 'C' THEN '공사용' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상' WHEN 'F' THEN '부판인' ELSE MM028B.CTEXT2 END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '4' END ORD, '4' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 <> 'E'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '5' ORD, '5' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT C.AREA||'1' ARA_GBN, C.AREA, C.AREA_NM, '' LIFNR, '' LIFNR_NM, '' CNAME, 'XXXX' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD FROM ( SELECT A.AREA, A.AREA_NM, B.LIFNR, B.LIFNR_NM, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM012A.LIFNR, MM012A.NAME1 LIFNR_NM, MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR AND WB010A.BSU_GB = '3' ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '3' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '4' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '무상' WHEN 'C' THEN '공사용' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상' WHEN 'F' THEN '부판인' ELSE MM028B.CTEXT2 END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '4' END ORD, '3' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 <> 'E'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '5' ORD, '4' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D WHERE C.AREA = 'E5'
UNION ALL
SELECT C.AREA||'0' ARA_GBN, C.AREA, C.AREA_NM, C.LIFNR, C.LIFNR_NM, C.CNAME, C.LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD FROM ( SELECT A.AREA, A.AREA_NM, B.LIFNR, B.LIFNR_NM, B.CNAME, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM012A.LIFNR, MM012A.NAME1 LIFNR_NM, MM012A.J_1KFREPRE CNAME, MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR AND WB010A.BSU_GB = '3' ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT CODE2, CTEXT2, '1' AFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS131' AND MM028A.CODE2 = 'A'
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '협력사계' CTEXT2, '2' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '무상' WHEN 'C' THEN '공사용' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상' WHEN 'F' THEN '부판인' ELSE MM028B.CTEXT2 END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '4' END ORD, '1' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 <> 'E'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '계' CTEXT2, '' ORD, '2' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D ) A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CS131_CNT) CS131_CNT, SUM(CS131_AMT) CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) > 0 THEN ROUND(((DOUBLE(SUM(GONG_AMT))/DOUBLE(SUM(CS131_AMT)))*100),0) ELSE 0 END GISUNG_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136_GND IN ('B','C','D','F') THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) END BUGA_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136_GND IN ('B','C','D','F') THEN 0 ELSE SUM(GONG_AMT) + TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) END SUM_AMT FROM ( -- 지역,협력사,제품구분,보수구분별 합계 SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CASE CS136_GND WHEN 'A' THEN 'B' WHEN 'E' THEN 'D' ELSE CS136_GND END CS136_GND, CS131_CNT, CS131_AMT, 0 GISUNG_AMT, GONG_AMT, 0 BUGA_AMT, 0 SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_CNT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN 0 WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D','E') THEN VALUE(SUM(CS131A.CS131_AMT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','Z','J','G') AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN = '' -- 분담이행방식이 아닌 것 GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_GND, SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1)
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'F' CS136_GND, 0 CS131_CNT, 0 CS131_AMT, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) H
UNION ALL
-- 협력사 합계 SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CS131_CNT) CS131_CNT, SUM(CS131_AMT) CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) > 0 THEN ROUND(((DOUBLE(SUM(GONG_AMT))/DOUBLE(SUM(CS131_AMT)))*100),0) ELSE 0 END GISUNG_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, SUM(BUGA_AMT) BUGA_AMT, SUM(SUM_AMT) SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(CS131_CNT) CS131_CNT, SUM(CS131_AMT) CS131_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, SUM(BUGA_AMT) BUGA_AMT, SUM(SUM_AMT) SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_CNT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN 0 WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D','E') THEN VALUE(SUM(CS131A.CS131_AMT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN ROUND((VALUE(DOUBLE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET))*1.1,0)),0) - VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END BUGA_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN ROUND((VALUE(DOUBLE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET))*1.1,0)),0) ELSE 0 END SUM_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','Z','J','G') AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN != 'X' -- 분담이행방식이 아닌 것 GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_GND, SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CS131_CNT, 0 CS131_AMT, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) GONG_AMT, 0 BUGA_AMT, 0 SUM_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) B GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND
UNION ALL
-- 지역 합계 SELECT CS136_ARA, 'XXXX' CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CS131_CNT) CS131_CNT, SUM(CS131_AMT) CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN SUM(CS131_AMT) > 0 THEN ROUND(((DOUBLE(SUM(GONG_AMT))/DOUBLE(SUM(CS131_AMT)))*100),0) ELSE 0 END GISUNG_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, 0 BUGA_AMT, 0 SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, CASE CS136_GND WHEN 'A' THEN 'B' WHEN 'E' THEN 'D' ELSE CS136_GND END CS136_GND, SUM(CS131_CNT) CS131_CNT, SUM(CS131_AMT) CS131_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_CNT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN 0 WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D','E') THEN VALUE(SUM(CS131A.CS131_AMT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3', ( SELECT A.AREA, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ORDER BY A.AREA, B.LGORT ) ARA_BSU WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136_ARA = ARA_BSU.AREA AND CS136_BSU = ARA_BSU.LGORT AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(DOUBLE(CS131_CNT)) CS131_CNT, SUM(DOUBLE(CS131_AMT)) CS131_AMT, SUM(DOUBLE(GONG_AMT)) GONG_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) WHEN SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D','E') THEN VALUE(COUNT(CS136A.MANDT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_CNT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B') THEN 0 WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('C','D','E') THEN VALUE(SUM(CS131A.CS131_AMT),0) ELSE 0 END CS131_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3', ( SELECT A.AREA, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ORDER BY A.AREA, B.LGORT ) ARA_BSU WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136_ARA = ARA_BSU.AREA AND CS136_BSU = ARA_BSU.LGORT AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','Z','J','G')
AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = #AREA#
AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN != 'X' -- 분담이행방식이 아닌 것 GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_GND, SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND
UNION ALL
SELECT 'TOT' TOT, WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CS131_CNT, 0 CS131_AMT, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #AREA#
GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) B GROUP BY TOT, CS136_GND ) TOT GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND ) B1 ON A1.AREA = B1.CS136_ARA AND A1.LGORT = B1.CS136_BSU AND A1.CS136_HNO = B1.CS136_HNO AND A1.CS136_GND = B1.CS136_GND LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- 지역계 부가세, 합계 SELECT CS136_ARA, CASE WHEN CS136_ARA = 'E5' THEN 'XXXX' ELSE 'YYYY' END CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136_ARA = 'E5' THEN SUM(GONG_AMT) ELSE SUM(GONG_AMT) END GONG_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136_ARA = 'E5' THEN SUM(BUGA_AMT) ELSE SUM(BUGA_AMT) END BUGA_AMT, CASE WHEN CS136_ARA = 'E5' THEN SUM(SUM_AMT) ELSE SUM(SUM_AMT) END SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CS136_ARA = 'E5' THEN 'E5' ELSE 'YY' END CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) BUGA_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) + TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','Z','J','G')
AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = #AREA#
AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN != 'X' -- 분담이행방식이 아닌 것 GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_GND, SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #AREA#
GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT
) B GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND ) C GROUP BY CS136_ARA ) C1 ON A1.AREA = C1.CS136_ARA AND A1.LGORT = C1.CS136_BSU AND A1.CS136_HNO = C1.CS136_HNO AND A1.CS136_GND = C1.CS136_GND LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- 총합계 부가세, 합계 SELECT '00' CS136_ARA, '0000' CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, SUM(BUGA_AMT) BUGA_AMT, SUM(SUM_AMT) SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT '00' CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT, TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) BUGA_AMT, SUM(GONG_AMT) + TRUNC(SUM(GONG_AMT) / 10,0) SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(GONG_AMT) GONG_AMT FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, CS136A.CS136_GND CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_GND BETWEEN 'A' AND 'E' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','Z','J','G')
AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = #AREA#
AND CS136A.CS136_BDGBN != 'X' -- 분담이행방식이 아닌 것 GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_GND, SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) GONG_AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #AREA#
GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT
) B GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND ) C ) D1 ON A1.AREA = D1.CS136_ARA AND A1.LGORT = D1.CS136_BSU AND A1.CS136_HNO = D1.CS136_HNO AND A1.CS136_GND = D1.CS136_GND WHERE 1=1
AND (A1.AREA = #AREA# OR A1.AREA = '00')
ORDER BY A1.ARA_GBN, A1.AREA, A1.LIFNR, A1.CS136_HNO, A1.ORD WITH UR
